Text:
A much smaller version which is not zipped (so you can actually see what you download):

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4297757/Bill_Bryson_-_A_Short_History_of_Nearly_Everything
First of all, Thanks for this.  I agree that I prefer stuff not compressed so I can see what files I am getting, but i very much appreciate the higher quality. This is a cd rip at 192khz.
